description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、护理师，台湾民众党籍。曾任立法委员、台北市政府顾问、台中市政府顾问等职。因硕士论文被认定违反学术伦理而被撤销学位。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and nurse, and a member of the Taiwan People's Party. She has served as a legislator, a consultant for the Taipei City Government, and a consultant for the Taichung City Government. Her master's degree was revoked after her thesis was found to have violated academic ethics.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党，由柯文哲创立。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China, founded by Ko Wen-je.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任台湾民众党中央委员会主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, serving as the Chairman of the Central Committee of the Taiwan People's Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台中市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taichung City, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任台中市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, serving as the Mayor of Taichung City.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法院的成员。
description.en: A member of the Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，递补蔡壁如辞职后的立法委员席位。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who succeeded Tsai Pi-ru's seat in the Legislative Yuan after her resignation.

description.zh-cn: 台湾屏东县下辖的乡，为蔡壁如的出生地。
description.en: A township in Pingtung County, Taiwan, and the birthplace of Tsai Pi-ru.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物及医师，台湾民众党创党人，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician, founder of the Taiwan People's Party, and former Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taipei City, Republic of China.

nodes.id: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

description.zh-cn: 台湾一所公立教学医院，蔡壁如曾在此担任护理师。
description.en: A public teaching hospital in Taiwan where Tsai Pi-ru formerly worked as a nurse.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾屏东县的科技大学，蔡壁如的母校。
description.en: A university of science and technology located in Pingtung County, Taiwan, and the alma mater of Tsai Pi-ru.

en: Takming University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的科技大学，因论文抄袭事件撤销了蔡壁如的硕士学位。
description.en: A university of science and technology in Taipei, Taiwan, which revoked Tsai Pi-ru's master's degree due to a plagiarism scandal.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，向德明财经科技大学检举蔡壁如论文涉嫌抄袭。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who reported Tsai Pi-ru's thesis to Takming University of Science and Technology for suspected plagiarism.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第十届立法委员选举，蔡壁如在此次选举中当选为不分区立法委员。
description.en: The 10th legislative election of the Republic of China, in which Tsai Pi-ru was elected as a legislator-at-large.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任立法院副院长，为蔡壁如在2024年立委选举中的竞争对手。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, serving as the Vice President of the Legislative Yuan, and was Tsai Pi-ru's opponent in the 2024 legislative election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党，在2024年立委选举中支持蔡壁如参选台中市第一选举区。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China that supported Tsai Pi-ru's candidacy in Taichung's 1st constituency during the 2024 legislative election.

description.zh-cn: 指中国国民党（蓝营）与台湾民众党（白营）之间的政治合作策略。
description.en: Refers to the political cooperation strategy between the Kuomintang (Blue camp) and the Taiwan People's Party (White camp).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第十一届立法委员选举，蔡壁如参选但竞选失利。
description.en: The 11th legislative election of the Republic of China, in which Tsai Pi-ru ran but was defeated.

description.zh-cn: 台湾一家企业集团，蔡壁如曾代柯文哲与其会面处理台北大巨蛋案。
description.en: A Taiwanese conglomerate with which Tsai Pi-ru met on behalf of Ko Wen-je to handle the Taipei Dome case.

description.zh-cn: 台北市议员，曾质疑蔡壁如私下与远雄集团会面处理大巨蛋案。
description.en: A Taipei City Councilor who questioned Tsai Pi-ru's private meeting with the Farglory Group regarding the Taipei Dome case.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任台北市政府观光传播局局长，据报因“牛仔裤案”被蔡壁如逼走而请辞。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former Commissioner of Taipei's Department of Information and Tourism, who reportedly resigned after being forced out by Tsai Pi-ru over the 'jeans incident'.

description.zh-cn: 台北市议员，蔡壁如的硕士论文部分内容被指与她的脸书发文雷同。
description.en: A Taipei City Councilor whose Facebook posts were allegedly plagiarized in parts of Tsai Pi-ru's master's thesis.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任台南市长，曾就“黄金海岸”名称来源与蔡壁如发生争议。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and then-Mayor of Tainan who had a dispute with Tsai Pi-ru over the origin of the name 'Golden Coast'.

description.zh-cn: 一本关于体外膜氧合技术的医学手册，由柯文哲等人合著，蔡壁如参与翻译及合著。
description.en: A medical manual on Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation, co-authored by Ko Wen-je and others, with Tsai Pi-ru participating as a translator and co-author.

description.zh-cn: 与柯文哲、蔡壁如合著《ECMO手册（第二版）》。
description.en: Co-authored the 'ECMO Manual (Second Edition)' with Ko Wen-je and Tsai Pi-ru.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如为台湾民众党籍党员，并于2025年1月19日当选为中央委员。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru is a member of the Taiwan People's Party and was elected as a Central Committee member on January 19, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 作为台湾民众党中央委员，蔡壁如在党内职位上低于党主席黄国昌。
description.en: As a Central Committee Member of the Taiwan People's Party, Tsai Pi-ru is subordinate to the party chairman Huang Kuo-chang.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如于2024年2月至12月期间担任台中市政府有给职顾问。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru served as a paid consultant for the Taichung City Government from February to December 2024.

description.zh-cn: 时任台中市长卢秀燕邀请蔡壁如出任台中市政府顾问。
description.en: Then-Taichung Mayor Lu Hsiu-yen invited Tsai Pi-ru to serve as a consultant for the Taichung City Government.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如担任第10届中华民国立法委员，后因论文争议辞职。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru served as a legislator in the 10th Legislative Yuan and later resigned due to the thesis controversy.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如辞去立法委员后，其席位由吴欣盈递补。
description.en: After Tsai Pi-ru resigned from her post as a legislator, her seat was filled by Wu Hsin-ying.

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如曾在国立台湾大学医学院附设医院担任加护病房护理师，后申请退休。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru worked as an ICU nurse at National Taiwan University Hospital before applying for retirement.

position.zh-cn: 竞选办公室核心幕僚、市长办公室主任
position.en: Core staff of campaign office, Director of the Mayor's Office

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如曾是柯文哲竞选台北市长时的核心幕僚，并在柯文哲市府时期担任市长办公室主任。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru was a core staff member for Ko Wen-je's Taipei mayoral campaign and served as the Director of the Mayor's Office during his administration.

position.en: Consultant, Director of the Mayor's Office

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如曾在柯文哲担任台北市长期间，任市府顾问及市长办公室主任。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru served as a consultant and Director of the Mayor's Office in the Taipei City Government during Ko Wen-je's tenure as mayor.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如毕业于美和护理专科学校（现美和科技大学）护理助产科。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru graduated from the Department of Nursing and Midwifery at Meiho Junior College of Nursing (now Meiho University).

description.zh-cn: 德明财经科技大学认定蔡壁如的硕士论文违反学术伦理，决议撤销其硕士学位。
description.en: Takming University of Science and Technology determined that Tsai Pi-ru's master's thesis violated academic ethics and resolved to revoke her master's degree.

description.zh-cn: 王浩宇向德明财经科技大学检举蔡壁如的硕士论文涉嫌抄袭，最终导致其学位被撤销。
description.en: Wang Hao-yu reported Tsai Pi-ru's master's thesis to Takming University of Science and Technology for suspected plagiarism, which ultimately led to the revocation of her degree.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如在2020年立法委员选举中，作为台湾民众党不分区名单成员成功当选。
description.en: In the 2020 legislative election, Tsai Pi-ru was successfully elected as a legislator from the Taiwan People's Party's party-list.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年立法委员选举中，蔡壁如代表民众党在台中市第一选举区参选，与时任立法院副院长蔡其昌竞争。
description.en: In the 2024 legislative election, Tsai Pi-ru represented the Taiwan People's Party in Taichung's 1st constituency, competing against the then-Vice President of the Legislative Yuan, Tsai Chi-chang.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年立法委员选举中，中国国民党礼让并支持蔡壁如参选台中市第一选举区。
description.en: In the 2024 legislative election, the Kuomintang yielded the constituency and supported Tsai Pi-ru's candidacy in Taichung's 1st constituency.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如在台中市第一选举区的参选是蓝白合作的一个实例。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru's candidacy in Taichung's 1st constituency was an instance of Blue-White cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如在2024年立法委员选举中竞选台中市第一选举区席位失利。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru was unsuccessful in her bid for the Taichung City 1st constituency seat in the 2024 legislative election.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如曾代柯文哲私下与远雄集团会面处理大巨蛋案。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru once met privately with the Farglory Group on behalf of Ko Wen-je to handle the Taipei Dome case.

description.zh-cn: 市议员吴世正质疑蔡壁如私下与远雄会面的行为违反了柯市府的公开透明原则。
description.en: City Councilor Wu Shih-cheng questioned Tsai Pi-ru's private meeting with Farglory, stating it violated the Ko administration's principles of openness and transparency.

description.zh-cn: 据报导，蔡壁如在府内会议上就“牛仔裤案”大作文章，被认为是逼走时任观传局长简余晏的最后一根稻草，导致其请辞。
description.en: It was reported that Tsai Pi-ru made a major issue of the 'jeans incident' in internal government meetings, which was considered the last straw that forced then-Tourism Commissioner Chien Yu-yen to resign.

description.zh-cn: 时任台南市长黄伟哲反驳了蔡壁如关于台南黄金海岸名称来源的说法。
description.en: Then-Tainan Mayor Huang Wei-cher refuted Tsai Pi-ru's claims about the origin of the name of Tainan's Golden Coast.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲是《ECMO手册》第一版和第二版的作者/合著者。
description.en: Ko Wen-je is the author/co-author of the first and second editions of the 'ECMO Manual'.

description.zh-cn: 蔡壁如是《ECMO手册》第一版的译者及第二版的合著者。
description.en: Tsai Pi-ru is the translator of the first edition and co-author of the second edition of the 'ECMO Manual'.

description.zh-cn: 赖建亨是《ECMO手册（第二版）》的合著者。
description.en: Lai Jian-heng is a co-author of the 'ECMO Manual (Second Edition)'.
